I dispute the detractors of this piece strongly. The art-work is reasonably good and the characters reasonably well developed but the plot does have too many threads which are not developed. It's simply too short to develop them adequately.

a good, but sad, porno epic; there is quasi-incest, good 'ol bondage S&M, straight male/female sex,

The plot seems to be basic, for a Japanese anime dealing with sex.  Boy forces himself on girl, girl is raped, girl is raped a lot, girl starts to enjoy it, end of story.  Not so with this story.  Son tricks stepmother into enjoying sex to get back at his real mom who he hates.  He abuses and uses her till she enjoys it.  In fact, she always enjoyed it from the start, becoming a perfect sex partner for him.  The problem, the twist comes, when he realizes he loves her and wants to change the relationship to one of love.  But she wants it rough and cares nothing about anything else - in other words he has created a monster just like him.  The anime is not the norm and the ending has somebody being killed - they just don't show you who.
Not for kids, not for young adults, heck, not really for anybody.  Rape, incest, S&M, almost everything is in the story but the plot is what makes it disturbing.  This is a story about a boy brain washing a woman and finding out too late that the end result is NOT what he wants.

I was really looking forwards to getting this as many of the other reviews were positive.  However...  I was greatly disappointed!  If you are expecting something to watch for enjoyment, you may not like the 'freeze frame' and 'stop motion' animation during the 'intimate' scenes.  It's very distracting.  Plus, I'm not one for glitter and fireworks and lightning to indicate 'climax'.  Seriously?  Lightning?  Again, the idea has some enticing possibilities for a solid story plot, but there was so much complaining and whining and moaning by the characters that I felt as if I was watching a family therapy session.  I get the psychological issues of the main character, but this was really pushing it and made me feel as if I was watching something for a paper on the psychology of family dynamics, and when the male character suddenly had a change of heart, it was almost a slap to my imagination that had me doing a WTF.  Not every dialogue between characters needs to be made up of their drama.  Plus, there were a lot of loop-wholes.  One thing I hate is when a single scene is used multiple times even though the scenes are between different characters at different times in the 'movie' - pointless.  Not to mention shading out the male characters' bodies and body parts is getting old.  Demonic flashing eyes and evil laughs makes this almost like a poor b-rated movie.  But the annoying part was that, towards the end, I was thinking more of what ice cream I was going to have before bed than what was going on in the 'movie'.  Honestly.  The end was just a turn-off, completely out of place and made me feel as if I was watching an X-rated episode of Law and Order's SVU.  It made me feel as if I was intruding on some personal family problem that was becoming annoying.  In the end, I wish I could return this for 'pointless waste of money'.  Now, it will be thrown out.  Do not waste your money if you are more into Hentai like Bible Black or others that have solid story lines, more intensity, no theatrics, no shading, and production that feels as if you're not hitting the pause button on your remote by accident.
